name: Idle World !
description:
Let us create the world again from scratch. In this idle clicker game you get the opportunity to recreate the world from the core.
Make Water, Land, Soil, Micro organisms,Plants ,animals ,Humans ,AI's and finally God !
Thats not all , once you create them then you have to preserve them as well !
Let's see if you can remake the whole world again or not !
